Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: Zwoop gets stronger by having the community crawl e-commerce websites thus providing a base of which to give the best deal to the consumers. Miners can do the following things:  - Crawl websites for product information, stock inventory, etc (CPU intensive) - AI image processing and AI model training (GPU intensive)  Anyone can download and run the crawler software to earn ZWP tokens. There will also be an update on the Zwoop website in a few weeks that includes a ZWP mining calculator.

Author: tk808
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: There are many problems and red flags with this ICO, but the most obvious from my first minute of looking at this ANN was the 300+ Years of blockchain coding experience. Basically what they are saying is they have 30 coders, with 10 years of experience each (Bitcoin launched in 2009 btw), that's a lot of developers and coders with experience with blockchain tech!  It's very unlikely, and can be seen as an outright lie or bullshit for several reasons, including, their names are not known in the crypto-spehere with projects prior to 2016.   Like i said one of the many red-flags. There are several other issues, but this post is most likely going to get moderated to preserve the integrity and scamminess of this ICO.

Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: People are able to spend using both fiat and cryptos, which includes the ZWP token. There will be some mechanisms implemented that allows merchants to reward users with ZWP tokens, which helps to bring an interest from people who may not be familiar with crypto yet.   Quote from: 320hz on August 07, 2018, 11:14:51 AM In the description of your project, I found information that users will receive a reward for sharing their data. Please explain what this means and what data do you mean?  The gist is that consumers are able to take back control of their data (such as age, country, shopping habits, etc), and the consumers themselves are able to choose when this data is shared to merchants. Should the consumer choose, they can store their data on the blockchain and they can choose how this is shared.  From the merchant side, they are able to give advertisements or promotions to a very specific demographic - such as "people in London that are between 20-25 years old and have bought a computer related product in the last 5 days". When the merchant is doing the promotion, they are able to know how many people are in this dataset and what are the statistics of the effectiveness of the campaign, but they are not able to see who exactly they are tar getting their promotions to.  I've also attached the section in the whitepaper that explains this - its quite a unique concept, so if you need clarifications let me know.

Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: Zwoop will crawl the internet to look for the best deals online, which means its network is not limited to merchant partnerships. So this means that for the search results on Zwoop to grow, its crawling engine just has to get better. This is much better than relying on merchant partnerships - technology is much faster to develop than business relationships.  Have you read about the Zwoop crawling pool? It has an interesting mechanic

Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: I think this is a common topic that could use a clarification, but in a basic gist, the merchants are taking a passive role with its relationship with Zwoop.  Let me arrange to have some further explanations with graphics about the Zwoop crawling pool, as it has a community involvement (with incentive) role as well.

Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: WEBSITE | JOIN WHITELIST | WHITEPAPER | TEAM | TWITTER | TELEGRAM | AIRDROP    1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132  Changing how the world shops online   Zwoop harnesses AI, advanced machine learning and blockchain to change ecommerce forever. Putting the control into the hands of consumers, Zwoop will enable users to find any product, from any merchant, in any country, and get the best deal every time, all in one revolutionary platform.  Where the Goliaths of ecommerce stifle retail, with results unfairly skewed by advertising affiliate deals and pay per click advertising, Zwoop is unbiased, supporting all merchants fairly and matching consumers with the best deals on any product. Unlike traditional search engines that use keywords, Zwoop’s AI understands the real meaning of the product, across any site or language. 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132     1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132  Bringing crypto, blockchain and AI to ecommerce   Consumers check out with one click thanks to Zwoop’s automation of the registration and payment process and in a game-changing move, can pay with fiat currency, ZWP tokens, or leading cryptocurrencies, opening up crypto to the retail industry, and as a result, people everywhere.  Bringing blockchain to the masses, Zwoop enables consumers to control their personal data, decide how it’s used, and get paid for sharing it.    The future of ecommerce is here. 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132

Body: How does Zwoop integrate with other e-commerce so that Zwoop is able to check-out and confirm the state of stock, is it by collaborating with e-commerce before the data is presented on the Zwoop platform?

Author: Valkrav
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: I support the question. I'm interested with what major trading companies  ZWOOP plans to cooperate in the future? Do you have any partnerships already as competition is very high?

Author: Zwoop
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: Just so I can answer effectively - Are you wondering about how Zwoop is presenting the searched products to the user?

Author: 320hz
Title: [ANN][ICO] ZWOOP | Transforming How the World Shops Online [ZWP]
Body: In the description of your project, I found information that users will receive a reward for sharing their data. Please explain what this means and what data do you mean?
